reviewText: Much has been made of the "tameness" of these DVDs.  For the producers, they are nothing but straightforward presentations of the beauty of an individual model, whether (scantily) clothed or unclothed.  Most viewers find this approach to be "tame."....  Our pornography is terribly graphic.  Quite "beyond the fringe."  The Japanese just wanted to show us the physical beauty of a Japanese girl....  Lend yourself to the process and you won't be disappointed.
